title: Add Instagram link to the site header

requirements.text: Add a visible Instagram link to the SiteHeader (desktop header navigation and mobile menu) that uses the configured Instagram URL and opens in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: On desktop widths, the header displays an "Instagram" link in the primary navigation area.
On mobile widths, the mobile menu includes an "Instagram" link.
Clicking the Instagram link opens https://www.instagram.com/herwellness_2026/ in a new tab/window.
External link uses rel="noopener noreferrer" for security.
No existing header navigation items (Home, Personalized Wellness, Wellness Kits, Challenges, Free PDFs, About) are removed or broken.

requirements.text: Update the site configuration so the canonical Instagram URL is set to https://www.instagram.com/herwellness_2026/ and the header/footer use this configuration value.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer Instagram link continues to work and points to https://www.instagram.com/herwellness_2026/.
The header Instagram link uses the same SITE_CONFIG.instagram.url value (no hardcoded duplicate URL).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components are read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not add or change any backend (Motoko) APIs or data models.
Do not change the Free PDFs content list or PDF asset files as part of this update.
Do not introduce third-party authentication or social API integrations beyond a simple external link.
